title: Islamic Schedule of Bank Charges
file_name: ISLAMIC SCHEDULE OF BANK CHARGES FOR THE PERIOD 01 01 2020 TO 30 06 2020.pdf
author: HBL
summary: This document outlines the Islamic banking charges applicable from January 1, 2020, to June 30, 2020. It includes various fees for services such as cash letters of credit, advisory fees, transfer charges, and exemptions based on maintaining specific account balances. Key phrases include 'Islamic Schedule of Bank Charges,' 'IPS Services Charges,' and 'Cash Letter of Credit,' which can help identify relevant queries related to this document.
